The hardest part of her job is to finish the embroideries, as they require hard work and time which makes it difficult to satisfy her customer’s needs. This is her first loan request to Microfinanzas Prisma. She will use the money to purchase more wool and fabric to make more pieces of embroidery.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Lopez, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase material for her embroideries

loans.name: Brigida

texts.es: Brígida tiene 36 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos. Tiene un puesto de ventas en el mercado cercano a su localidad, donde vende  todo tipo de condimentos y especias que son utilizadas para sazonar las comidas, a Brígida le satisface que los productos que vende son de muy buena calidad, además a logrado que este negocio sea sostenible y dure por más de 10 años. Con esta actividad Brígida es parte importante de la economía de su casa y sus hijos son para ella la mejor motivación para seguir trabajando, además considera que no tiene muchas dificultades, ya que solo requiere de atender su puesto por las mañanas y todas las tardes tiene disponibilidad para estar con sus hijos. Es la primera vez que Brígida esta solicitando un préstamo con MFP, ella fue invitada a su banco comunal por ser una persona  responsable en sus pagos. Con cantidad de dinero comprará al por mayor los condimentos no procesados aun, como ají colorado, ají amarillo, entre otros.
texts.en:
Brígida is 36 years old and lives with her husband and 3 children. She has a sales shop on a market near her town, where she sells all kinds of spices and dressings. Brígida is very pleased by the quality of her products. She has been able to manage a sustainable business for more than 10 years which is a very important part of her home economy. Her children are the best encouragement to keep on working. She doesn’t have many difficulties, as she only works at the shop in the morning, so she has the rest of day to be with her children. This is her first loan request to MFP. She was invited to this community bank thanks to her good record on making responsible payments in the past. She will use the money to purchase more un-processed spices, such as pepper, chili, and others.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Lopez, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase more spices

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen tiene 50 años, vive con su esposo y sus hijos. Se dedica a realizar bellos y artísticos objetos artesanales, adquirió de sus padres esta habilidad de transformar simples objetos en artesanías muy cotizadas en el ámbito turístico, ella elabora desde llaveros, aretes, hasta objetos en barro que  reflejan las costumbres de su tierra y todo lo que fabrica lo vende al por mayor a las principales tiendas artesanales de su medio, de esta manera, por más de 20 años, ha sido un sostén importante en su hogar, lo que la anima a seguir adelante, ya que  todavía sigue apoyando a la última de sus hijas en sus estudios superiores. Carmen tiene ese el gran sueño de que sus productos sean  calificados para exportar a otros países, para lo cual se viene capacitando. Es la tercera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, y en todo este tiempo ella demostró ser responsable en sus pagos. Carmen invertirá esta vez en la compra de los materiales que utiliza para elaborar sus artesanías, como calabazas, pinturas y arcilla.
texts.en:
Carmen is 50 years old. She lives with her husband and children. She sells beautiful handicraft items. She learned the skill of transforming simple objects into valuable pieces of art from her parents, items that are very popular among the tourists. She makes different items from key chains, to clay objects that reflect the customs of her people. She manufactures wholesale items to sell to large handicraft shops. She has been an important support for her family for more than 20 years, which encourages her to go on, as she still has to support her last daughter with her higher education. Carmen’s dream is to obtain a certificate to export her products to other countries and for that reason she’s doing training on this matter. This is the third time she requests for a loan from MFP, and all this time she has proven to be responsible with her payments. Carmen will invest on the purchase of more material to use in her handicraft items, such as vases, paint and clay.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Lopez, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase material for her handicrafts

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es: Edgar tiene 53 años, vive al lado de su esposa y sus 2 hijos. El es una persona muy trabajadora que no descuida la atención de sus hijos, es por ello que decidió abrir una tienda en la plaza de su localidad donde vende gaseosas y abarrotes, también alquila videos de películas, todo esto realiza para generarse ingresos junto con su esposa. Además, brinda sus servicios de armado de calzados para una de las tantas fábricas de zapatos que abundan en su localidad. Y como si fuera poco es también es agricultor, cada 6 meses siembra y cosecha los  productos nativos de su tierra, este esforzado padre es motivado diariamente por el gran amor que le tiene a su familia. Es la segunda vez que Don Edgar solicita un préstamo con MFP, y ha demostrado ser puntual en sus pagos el ciclo pasado. Esta vez comprará más mercadería para su tienda, víveres y cajas de gaseosa, además de películas de estreno para su negocio.
texts.en:
Edgar is 53 years old. He lives with his wife and 2 children. He is a very hard worker and never neglects his children. For this reason, he decided to open a new shop together with his wife on his local town park where they sell sodas and groceries and they also rent movies in order to make profit. He also provides services as a shoe maker for one of the many shoe factories in his town. And he is also a farmer, so every 6 months he sows and crops native products. This hard working father is motivated his great love to his family. This is the second time Edgar requests for a loan from MFP, and he has proven to be responsible with the payment in the past. This time, he will purchase products for his shop, suppies and sodas, together with new movies for his business.

Translated from Spanish by Jimena Lopez, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase more products for his shop

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.es: Eulalia tiene 30 años, vive con su  esposo y sus 2 hijos. Esta madre nunca deja de trabajar para lograr que su familia sea beneficiada con el fruto de su trabajo, se dedica a la crianza de animales que posteriormente vende en la feria ganadera, luego de varios meses de engorde, además, aprovecha la leche que producen sus vacas,  al día logra vender hasta 13 litros, y con las ganancias logra cubrir las necesidades de sus hijos. Es por ello que tiene mucho cuidado en la limpieza de su establo y en la alimentación de sus vacas y demás animales, ya que sería una perdida grande si una de sus vacas llega a enfermarse. Es su 4to préstamo con MFP, ella es una de las clientas más responsables de su banco comunal. Con el dinero solicitado comprará alimento balanceado para sus animales, además invertirá en el negocio de armado de zapatos que hace un mes instaló en su casa.
texts.en:
Eulalia is 30 years old and lives with her husband and 2 children. This mother never stops working to ensure that her family benefits from the fruit of her labor. She raises animals to then sell in the livestock market. After various months of fattening, she also takes advantage of the milk that her cows products. To date she has been able to sell 13 liters and with the profits cover her children’s necessities. She takes much care in cleaning her stable and in feeding her cows and other animals, as it would be a great loss if one of her cows became ill. This is her 4th loan with MFP, she is one of the most responsible members of her Communal Bank. With the money she will buy nutritionally balanced food for her animals, in addition she will invest in a shoe business that she opened one month ago in her home.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy nutritionally balanced food for her animals

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.es: Evelyn tiene 37 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Trabaja diariamente en la atención de su tienda, incluyendo los días domingo, donde afirma que tiene más ventas. Comenzó este negocio hace más de 4 años con muy poco capital, pero con la atención esmerada que ofrece, ha visto acrecentar su capital de trabajo, y ahora tiene grandes expectativas y metas; una de ellas es incrementar su mercadería y ser una bodega tipo minimarket. Cada día Evelyn ofrece una cálida sonrisa a sus clientes y esto es la mejor garantía del aumento y fidelidad de sus consumidores, además no es una actitud forzada, ya que disfruta de ser dueña de su propia fuente de ingresos. Es la segunda vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, y ha demostrado ser puntual en sus pagos. La cantidad que pide será invertida en la compra de mercadería para surtir su tienda con productos comestibles.
texts.en:
Evelyn is 37 years old and lives with her husband and their two children. She works daily attending to her store, including Sundays, which is when she says she has the most sales. She began the business four years ago with very little capital, but with her attention to detail she has seen her work capital grow and now she has great expectations and goals; one of them is to increase her merchandise and be a grocery store-type mini market. Each day Evelyn offers a warm smile to her clients and this is a guarantee of faithfulness to her consumers; this is not a forced attitude since she enjoys being the boss of her own source of income. This is the second time that she requested a loan from MFP, and she has demonstrated that she is punctual in her payments. The quantity that she requests will be invested in the purchase of merchandise to stock her store with edible products.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Higidia

texts.es: Higidia tiene 57 años, y vive con su esposo y sus hijos. Desde hace un año se dedica a la venta de productos de medicina, comenzó siendo consumidora y luego lo hizo su fuente de ingresos, en un inicio fue difícil adquirir clientes, pero se adaptó a esta forma de trabajo, que consiste en buscar a sus clientes casa por casa y a través de amistades. Este negocio le ha permitido tener  lo ingresos necesarios para sus 4 hijos, ya que muchas veces el sueldo de su esposo suele ser insuficiente. Ahora, Higidia se está proyectando a manejar mayor capital para sus ventas y establecerse en un local en una zona comercial. Es la tercera  vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, demostrando ser una persona responsable. Con esta cantidad comprará al por mayor más productos, además alquilará un local donde ofrezca comida y venda estos productos de medicina natural.
texts.en:
Higidia is 57 years old and lives with her husband and their children. Since a year ago she has been dedicated to selling medicinal products. She began as a consumer and later made it her source of income. At the beginning it was difficult to acquire clients but she adapted to this form of work, which involves searching for clients from house to house and through friendships. This business has allowed her to have the necessary income for her four children since many times the salary of her husband tends to be insufficient. Now, Higidia is planning to operate with greater capital for her sales and establish a store in a commercial zone. This is the third time that she has requested a loan with MFP, showing that she is a responsible person. With this quantity, she will buy more products in bulk and she will rent a store where she offers food and sells these natural medicine products.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase the products that she sells

loans.name: Irene

texts.es: Irene tiene 31 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Se dedica al transporte, junto a su esposo poseen movilidades que cubren la ruta de Jauja a Huancayo (1 hora y media), esta actividad es la que les permite tener ingresos en la familia, Irene se encarga de administrar y controlar que sus carros siempre estén en sus rutas, además siempre está al pendiente del correcto funcionamiento de sus movilidades, es por ello que tiene un depósito de repuestos de llantas y otros implementos para auto. Irene se siente satisfecha por su negocio y tiene muchos deseos de continuar dedicándose al transporte, ya que ella lo ve con mucho futuro por delante. Es su 4to préstamo con MFP, es una clienta de confianza. Con el dinero que solicita podrá invertir en el mantenimiento y la revisión mecánica de sus movilidades.
texts.en:
Irene is 31 years old and lives with her husband and their two children. She is dedicated to transportation, and together with her husband they possess vehicles that cover the route from Jauja to Huancayo (one and a half hours). This activity is what allows the family to have an income. Irene is in charge of managing their cars so that they are always on their routes and so she is always dependent on them running properly, which is why she has a warehouse of replacement tires and other car parts. Irene feels satisfied by her business and has a lot of desire to continue working in transportation, since she sees in it a good future ahead. This is her fourth loan with MFP and she is a trustworthy client. With the money that she is requesting, she will be able to invest in the maintenance and the mechanic repairs of her vehicles.

Translated from Spanish by Jay Osborne, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Maintenance of her cars.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es: Jessica tiene 34 años, vive con su madre y sus 2 hijos. Desde hace más de 3 años vende cosméticos por catálogo y su principal punto de venta es su centro de trabajo, ya que ella es docente y ha visto que la mejor forma de ofrecer sus productos es a sus amistades y personas conocidas, es así que aumentó durante este tiempo su mercadería y tiene proyectos de seguir creciendo, ya que  sus 2 hijos necesitan cada día más gastos para sus estudios. Los productos que Jessica vende son de las principales líneas de belleza, lo que garantiza sus ventas por ser productos de calidad. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, por lo que promete ser una clienta  responsable en sus pagos. En esta oportunidad invertirá en la compra de más productos, y así tener mayor cantidad de mercadería en stock, a la mano, para poder vender inmediatamente sin el catálogo.
texts.en:
Jessica is 34 years old, she lives with her mother and her 2 children. For more than 3 years she has been selling cosmetics from catalogue and her main point of sale is her working place as she is a teacher and has seen that the best way of offering her products is to friends and known individuals. During this time she has increased her merchandise and plans to keep growing as her 2 children need more financial support for their studies. The products Jessica sells are well-known quality brands and therefore her sales are good. This is the first time she requests a loan from MFP but she promises to be responsible with the repayments. The loan will be invested in buying more products to increase the stock and be able to sell inmediately without the catalogue.

Translated from Spanish by Lene Struck Christensen, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase stock to improve business.

loans.name: Kathy

texts.es: Khaty tiene 25 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Trabaja diariamente disponiendo de sus horarios para vender productos naturales, va en búsqueda de sus clientes caminado por las calles, así vende sus productos, y aunque para ella no fue nada fácil comenzar este trabajo, hoy mira con satisfacción los resultados, pues ahora sus clientes recomiendan a otros sus productos y de esta manera es una forma de captar nuevos clientes. Adicionalmente, Kathy tiene un puesto de venta de jugos que generalmente es atendido en las mañanas, este también es un espacio para ofrecer sus productos. Hace algunos días su puesto de jugo estuvo cerrado, porque Kahty estaba ocupando casi todo su tiempo en la venta de sus productos naturales, pero ya está dispuesta a volver a vender sus deliciosos jugos. Es la segunda vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, y ha demostrado durante este tiempo ser responsable en sus pagos. El dinero será utilizado en la compra de los productos que vende, además de fruta para su puesto de jugos.
texts.en:
Kathy is 25 years old and lives with her husband and 2 sons. She works daily around her schedule to sell natural products. She goes in search of her clients by walking through the streets, and this is how she sells her products. Although it was not easy for her to start this business, today she can look with satisfaction on the results, since now her clients recommend her products to others and this is one way for her to get new clients. In addition, Kathy has a juice stand that she generally works from in the mornings. Her juice stand is also a place where she can sell her products. It was closed a few days ago because Kathy was busy almost the whole time selling her natural products, but now she is ready to sell her delicious juices again. This is the second time that she is requesting a loan with MFP, and during this time she has proven to be responsible with her payments. The money will be used to buy the products she sells and fruit for her juice stand.

Translated from Spanish by Tara Binetti, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the number of products she sells

loans.name: Lili

texts.es: Lili tiene 34 años, vive con sus 6 hijos. Hace más de un año que se dedica a comprar diversos productos y venderlos en la ciudad de Lima, uno de los productos que vende es queso, que lo compra al por mayor y cada quincena viaja para venderlos en los mercados principales de la capital, de esa manera se genera los recursos económicos suficientes que le permiten sostener a sus 6 hijos, lo admirable es que ella sola es el único sostén para sus hijos, es por ello que los esfuerzos de esta madre son tan necesarios. Es la segunda vez que Lili solicita un préstamo con MFP, y está comprometida en ser puntual en sus pagos. Con este dinero adquirirá más mercadería para aprovechar estas fiestas navideñas, además de comprar quesos al por mayor, también comprará truchas.
texts.en:
Lili is 34 years old, she lives with her 6 children. For more than a year she has been buying different products to sell in the town of Lima. One of the products is cheese which she buys in bulk and every fortnight she travels to sell at the principal markets of the capital and this way obtain sufficient economic resources to support her 6 children. It is to be admired that she is their only means of support and therefore the efforts of this mother are very necessary. This is the second time Lili requests a loan with MFP and she is commited to be punctual with the payments. With the money she will purchase more merchandise to take advantage of the Cristmas season. Apart from buying cheese in bulk she will also purchase trouts.

Translated from Spanish by Lene Struck Christensen, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase stock to improve sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a used sewing machine to keep running her business.

loans.name: Lina

texts.es: Lina tiene 26 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Ella se dedica a dos cosas principalmente, confecciona zapatos con su máquina de coser cuero y cría animales menores, especialmente cuyes, para ello instaló una granja bien acogedora para sus animales, todas las mañanas sale al campo a cortar  y curtir el pastizal que es el alimento especial de sus cuyes, luego, junto a su esposo, comienzan a armar los zapatos para cubrir los pedidos que tiene, venden por docena y su mejor época es durante los meses de marzo y abril, cuando se inicia el año escolar. Para Lina estas dos actividades son las fuentes de ingreso económico para su familia, y se siente muy contenta y satisfecha de su trabajo. Es su 4to préstamo con MFP, y es considerada una de las clientas de mayor confianza. Con el dinero que solicita comprará las piezas para mejorar su máquina de coser cuero, fertilizante para sus pastos y también una parte del pago para la compra de una vaca lechera.
texts.en:
Lina is 26 years old and she lives with her husband and her 2 children. Mainly she makes shoes with her sewing machine and breeds small animals, especially guinea-pigs and she had a cosy farm set up for her animals. Every morning she cuts and treats grass which is the special food for guinea-pigs, then, together with her husband, she begins making the shoes for the existing orders. They sell by the dozen and the best months are March and April when the school-year starts. These two activities represent the income source for the family and Lina is happy and satisfied with her work. This is her 4th loan with MFP and she is considered one of the most reliable clients. With the money she will buy spare parts for her sewing machine, fertilizer for the grass, and a downpayment for a milk cow.

Translated from Spanish by Lene Struck Christensen, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Improve her sewing machine for leather.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: El señor Miguel Ángel Ramírez tiene la edad de 33 años, habita en el barrio buenos aires, ubicado en el municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su esposa y hijos, la esposa de don Miguel Trabaja como secretaria para ayudarle con los gastos del hogar ya que tienen  a su cargo una pequeña de un año de edad, los planes hacia un futuro es llegar a tener una mejor condición de vida, ya que han pasado muchas dificultades desde que nació su pequeña bebé. El trabaja desde hace ocho años como agricultor, pero por falta de financiamiento no ha logrado sacar una buena producción. El solicita el financiamiento de Afodenic para poder comprar insumos y poder aplicarle a su cultivo; para obtener mejor resultado en su producción y venderlo a un buen precio a sus clientes
texts.en:
Señor Miguel Ángel Ramírez is 33 years old and lives in the municipality of Ticuantepe in Buenos Aires together with his wife and children. Señor Miguel’s wife works as a secretary to help out with the household expenses because they are taking care of a one year old baby girl. Their hope for the future is to arrive at a better condition in life, as they have already had so many difficulties since their little girl was born. Miguel has worked for about eight years as a farmer, but because of a lack of finance he has been unable to achieve a good yield. He has requested financing from Afodenic for the purchase of fertilizers and pesticides for his cultivation in order to achieve a better yield and to sell at a good price to his clients.

Translated from Spanish by Eric Strader, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of a hair dryer and other materials for a beauty salon.

loans.name: Edgardo Jose

texts.es: El señor Edgar José Palacio tiene la edad  de 40 años,  habita en el sector de la borgoña ubicado en el municipio de Ticuantepe , junto a sus esposa la cual trabaja como comerciante , para poder ayudarle con los gastos del hogar , don Edgar es agricultor y comerciante desde hace dieciocho años , la mayor dificultad que de le ha presentado es la falta de financiamiento , los planes hacia un futuro en mejorar los cultivos para poder vender en buen precio ya que estos carecen de insumos y por tanto no hay buena producción .El solicita un financiamiento para poder comprar insumos y aplicárselos al cultivo y obtener mejores beneficios en las ventas, y a si obtendrá mejores ingresos
texts.en:
Mr. Edgar Jose Palacio is 40 years old and lives in the area of Borgoña, located in the municipality of Ticuantepe. He lives with his wife, who works as a merchant in order to help him with the household bills. Edgar has been a farmer and merchant for the past 18 years. The greatest difficulty he has encountered is the lack of financing. His future plans are to improve his crop to sell at a better price, but since he lacks supplies there is not a good crop production. He is asking for a loan in order to buy supplies to use in his cultivation, and therefore produce better profits in his sales and earn a better income.

Translated from Spanish by Christina Stoddard, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy supplies like fertilizer for his crop

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: Lourdes tiene 34 años y vive con su madre. Desde hace 8 años vende cosméticos, se inicia en este negocio por medio de la invitación de una de sus amigas, y desde entonces no ha parado de animarse cada día a continuar. En un inicio vendía de casa en casa, pero ahora ya tiene un pequeño espacio en un local comercial, es por ello que Lourdes sigue con grandes expectativas para su desarrollo  a fin de tener lo necesario y ayudar  en la economía de su casa. Para el futuro se está proyectando para arrendar un stand más grande donde pueda tener más productos de belleza. Es la primera vez que Lourdes solicita un préstamo con MFP, y está comprometida  a ser responsable en el pago de sus cuotas. Con esta cantidad de dinero podrá adquirir más cosméticos que tendrán buena demanda en esta fecha navideña.
texts.en:
Lourdes is 34 years old and lives with her mother. She began selling cosmetics 8 years ago, when she got started in the business with a friend. She has continued to pursue it every day since. She began by selling door-to-door but now she has a small space in a commercial location. She has great expectations to develop it in order to support her family economically. In the future, she plans to rent a bigger stand where she can feature more beauty products. This is the first time Lourdes has applied for a loan with MFP, and she promises to be responsible in the repayment of this loan. With this amount of money she will be able to get more cosmetics, which are in great demand this holiday season.

Translated from Spanish by Michelle Harrison, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase more costmetics

loans.name: Mabel

texts.es: Mabel tiene 36 años, vive con su esposo  y sus 3 hijos. Desde hace 16 años vende comida en la principal calle de su localidad, sobre todo en las tardes, para ello arrendó un local comercial cerca de su casa y ofrece todo tipo de platos típicos, por lo que ha tenido la acogida de sus clientes que cada vez demandan más de ella. Mabel desea seguir creciendo, y no solo atender en las tardes, sino también durante todo el día  para incrementar sus ventas, su trabajo es su mejor satisfacción y sobre todo porque es para cubrir las necesidades de su familia, por lo que no descansara por seguir mejorando. Es la primera que Mabel solicita un préstamo con MFP, ella ha sido invitada por su banco comunal porque conocen que es responsable. Esta cantidad será invertida en la compra de los ingredientes que utiliza para su negocio y mejorar su cocina.
texts.en:
Mabel is 36 years old and lives with her husband and 3 children. For 16 years, she has sold food on the main street in her town, mostly during the afternoons. She has rented a commercial location near her house and she offers many typical dishes to her clients, who enjoy these dishes and continue to ask for more from her. Mabel would like to continue to grow her business, and not just serve patrons during the afternoons but during the entire day as well, in order to increase her sales. Her work is a major source of satisfaction, above all because she is able to provide necessities to her family, for whom she will work to improve her business. This is the first loan Mabel has sought with MFP. She has been chosen by the communal bank because they know she is responsible. Mabel will use this loan to invest in more ingredients which will be used for her business and to improve her kitchen.

Translated from Spanish by Michelle Harrison, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase ingredients to prepare her dishes.

loans.name: María

texts.es: María tiene 44 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Desde hace 5 años tiene una tienda en su casa, donde atiende con mucho esmero a sus clientes, es por ello que siempre está pendiente de los productos innovadores que serán de atracción para el público. De preferencia, María atiende por las mañanas, ya que por las tardes las ventas son bajas, nos comenta, que las mejores fechas de ventas son durante las festividades locales y fiestas navideñas. Ella está contenta y satisfecha con su negocio, porque le permite tener ingresos económicos para su familia. Es la tercera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, y ha demostrado ser una persona puntual en sus pagos. Con este dinero podrá comprar panetones (postre típico de navidad) para su tienda, ya que por estas fechas existe mayor demanda de estos productos.
texts.en:
María is 44 years old and she lives with her husband and 2 children. For 5 years, she has run a shop out of her home, where she tends to her clients with much care. It is because of this that she is always dependent on innovative products that will be attractive to the public. María prefers to sell in the morning, since sales are low in the afternoon. She tells us that the best sales days are during local festivities and the Christmas season. She is happy and satisfied with her business because it allows her to generate income for her family. This is the third time that she is requesting a loan with MFP, and she has proven to be timely with her payments. With this money she will be able to buy "panetones" (a traditional Christmas dessert) for her shop, since around this time there is a higher demand for this type of product.

Translated from Spanish by Tara Binetti, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy "panetones" (traditional dessert) for Christmastime

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes tiene 39 años, vive con su esposo y su hija. Ella vende cosméticos desde hace más de un año, los reparte al crédito a sus amistades y personas que considera de confianza, sus clientes son principalmente profesionales de la salud que laboran en los hospitales, después los busca en su centro de trabajo periódicamente para cobrarles, de esta manera logra un ingreso más en su hogar. Su esposo también trabaja, pero muchas veces el sueldo no es suficiente. Mercedes actualmente está embarazada, y no puede caminar mucho, sin embargo, para no perder sus ventas está siendo apoyada por algunos familiares. Es la primera vez que Mercedes solicita un préstamo con MFP, fue invitada a formar parte de su banco comunal por ser una persona responsable. Con esta cantidad de dinero podrá invertir en la compra de más cosméticos para aprovechar esta fiesta navideña.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 39 years old and she lives with her husband and her daughter. She has been selling cosmetics for over a year. She distributes them on credit to her friends and to people she considers reliable. Her clients are mainly health professionals who work in the hospitals, and afterward she periodically meets them in their workplace to collect payment. This is how she generates more income for her household. Her husband also works, but oftentimes his salary is not enough. Mercedes is pregnant right now and she cannot walk much; nevertheless, in order not to lose out on sales, her relatives are helping to support her. This is the first time that Mercedes is requesting a loan with MFP. She was invited to become part of her communal bank because she is a responsible person. With this amount of money, she will be able to invest in buying more cosmetics in order to take advantage of the holiday season.

Translated from Spanish by Tara Binetti, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy more cosmetics

loans.name: Miluska

texts.es: Miluska tiene 44 años,  es soltera y vive con sus padres. Su negocio es el transporte, tiene una línea de taxis, ella trata con choferes de autos para que trabajen con la licencia municipal que ella posee, su ganancia está en el pago por el derecho de entrar como parte de la línea de taxis, es por ello que Miluska ha crecido bastante durante este año, y para seguir con su crecimiento implementó en su oficina de control una pequeña tienda donde vende filtros, lubricantes, entre otros. Miluska  tiene grandes expectativas de crecer, y en el futuro implementar su tienda con la venta de repuestos, y convertirla en una gran tienda especializada en autos. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, por lo que se compromete a ser una clienta puntual en sus pagos. En esta oportunidad invertirá en la compra, al por mayor, de aceite para autos.
texts.en:
Miluska is 44 years old, single, and living with her parents. She working in transportation and has a taxi line. She works with car drivers so that they can work with the municipal license that she has. Her earnings come from others paying her for the right of coming on as part of her taxi line and it is because of this that Miluska has grown her business so much during this year. In order to continue growing, she has set up a small shop in her control office where she sells filters, lubricants, and other things. Miluska is expecting a large amount of growth and in the future she plans to set up shop to sell spare parts and convert it into a big store specializing in cars. This is the first time she is requesting a loan with MFP, and she is committed to be being timely with her payments. At this time, she will invest in buying car oil wholesale.

Translated from Spanish by Tara Binetti, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy oil for cars

loans.name: Juana Adilia

texts.es: La Sr. Juana tiene 39 años de edad, habitante deL barrio Villa Reconciliación en la capital de managua, casada su esposo trabaja como transportista en una empresa privada. Los planes para su familia es mejorar su negocio y vivienda. Doña Juana se desempeña en su pequeño negocio de comideria  en su casa, sus planes en el ámbito laboral es aumentar el volumen de productos y así aumentar sus ganancias. Gracias a los préstamos de Afodenic lograr comprar mayores cantidades de productos para su negocio para ofrecer a sus clientes los ricos platillos variados
texts.en:
Señora Juana is 39 years old and lives in the Villa Reconciliación neighborhood in the capital city of Managua. She is married and her husband works as a transporter for a private company. She would like to improve her business and dwelling. Doña Juana runs her small restaurant out of her house. She plans to increase the volume of her sales and therefore increase her earnings. Thanks to the loan from Afodenic she will be able to buy larger quantities of supplies for her business and will be able to offer her customers a variety of delicious dishes.

Translated from Spanish by Matthew Raimondi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase raw materials and increase sales of various types of food

loans.name: Mirtha

texts.es: Mirtha tiene 36 años, y vive con sus padres. Se dedica a la venta de muñecas de tela que ella misma elabora, lo que viene haciendo desde hace un año, para lo cual se ha preparado estudiando en un centro ocupacional y ahora esta actividad es una de sus mayores fuentes de ingreso. Mirtha es docente y aprovecha pequeños espacios de su tiempo para vender sus muñecas, y con la creatividad que posee ha logrado elaborar novedosos diseños que atraen a sus clientes que le hacen más pedidos, y aún más en esta época festiva.  Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, por lo que se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Con esta cantidad podrá invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios para  la elaboración de las muñecas, así mismo, adquirirá prendas de vestir para vender junto con las muñecas.
texts.en:
Mirtha is 36 years old and lives with her parents. She works selling cloth dolls that she makes herself, which she has been doing for a year. She was trained to do this by studying at an occupational center and now this practice is one of her greatest sources of income. Mirtha is a docent and takes advantage of the limited time she has for selling her dolls. With her creativity, she has been able to make original designs that attract clients who place more orders with her, which happens even more often during the holiday season. This is the first time that she is requesting a loan with MFP, and she promises to be timely with her payments. With this amount, she will be able to invest in buying the necessary materials for making the dolls and clothes to sell with the dolls.

Translated from Spanish by Tara Binetti, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy materials for making her dolls

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Don Juan es operario en una maquiladora, y su esposa pertenece al gremio de veladores, estos son sus únicos ingresos y a pesar de no tener más dependientes económicos sus egresos absorben una gran parte de sus salarios.
En este momento el suegro del Sr. M. requiere de unos estudios médicos inmediatos, pues la enfermedad que tiene (Diabetes) le exige el mayor cuidado.
Solicita de su apoyo para cubrir el costo que se genere, y sobre todo para el tratamiento que tenga que darle. El enfermo es de edad avanzada y no puede sufragarse por si solo; Manda un saludo cordial para todos ustedes que altruistamente lo socorrerán con esta gran necesidad.
texts.en:
Juan is an assembly plant operator, and his wife works in the business of selling bedside tables. These are their only sources of income and despite not having more economic dependents, their expenses take up a large part of their salaries. At the present time, Mr. M.'s father-in-law needs medical tests done right away because the illness that he has (diabetes) demands the greatest amount of care. Mr. M. is asking for your support to cover the cost of the tests, and, most importantly, for the treatment that his father-in-law will need. He is a sick, elderly man and cannot defray the costs by himself. He sends warm regards to all of you who will help him out of the goodness of your hearts during his time of great need.

Translated from Spanish by Tara Binetti, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To pay for medical tests

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
El señor G. tiene un pequeño negocio de video juegos, el cual es atendido por su esposa la Sra. Karla Lorena. Don Luis se encarga de la administración debido a que su empleo de planta no le permite estar todos los dias al frente, solo cuando no tiene programado viajar él, le ayuda.
Los viajes que realiza son del empleo que tiene en una línea transportista. 
Nos comentan que desean agrandar el negocio, tener variedad de comida rápida (un snack), para los niños y jóvenes que acuden y así puedan disfrutar del juego acompañado de algún bocadillo.
Ellos tienen poco con este proyecto pero tienen muchas esperanzas puestas en el mismo, desean que ustedes los apoyen para lograr sus metas; se los agradecerán siempre. En el momento de la visita el Sr. G. no se encontraba, asi que solo sale la Sra. Karla.
texts.en:
Mr. Gutierrez has a small videogame and snack shop that his wife Karla runs. Mr Gutierrez is in charge of the administration of the business since his job with a transportation company requires a lot of traveling. When he is not traveling he helps Karla with the business. They would like to expand their shop, to have a variety of fast food for the kids and young people that come to play videogames—this way they can enjoy the games with a snack. Mr. Gutierrez and Karla do not have much, but they have a lot of hopes for this project. They hope you can help them achieve their goals and they will be forever grateful. Due to his travels Mr. Gutierrez was not available for a picture, but pictured above is Karla.

Translated from Spanish by Rachel Crouch, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Perseveranda

texts.es: Perseveranda tiene 64 años, vive con su esposo y sus hijas mayores. Elabora  todo tipo de pasteles que ella misma decora para todo tipo de compromisos sociales, para cada semana hace un inventario de los pedido, luego va a comprar los insumos necesarios para elaborar sus pasteles y cumplir puntualmente con sus pedidos, de esa manera garantiza los ingresos para su familia. Esta labor la viene haciendo desde su juventud y gracias a esta dedicación pudo sostener a sus hijos. Por el momento Perseveranda está a la espera de los  y preparando los implementos para hacer una bonita decoración. Es la segunda vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, y ha demostrado ser puntual en sus pagos. Con esta cantidad de dinero podrá invertir en la compra de harina, saborizantes, manteca, entre otros, ingredientes al por mayor, de este modo cubrirá los pedidos que tiene para realizar los pasteles.
texts.en:
Perseveranda is 64 years old and lives with her husband and older daughters. She creates all kinds of cakes that she decorates for all kinds of social events. Each week she takes an inventory of her orders; later she purchases all of the ingredients required to make the cakes and she works hard to complete her orders on time. Creating and decorating the cakes is how Perseveranda makes a living and supports her family. She has been working in this profession since she was young and thanks to her dedication she has been able to support her children. At the moment Perseveranda is waiting to purchase ingredients and preparing to create a beautiful decoration. This is the second time she has applied for a loan with MFP and she has demonstrated her ability to make her payments on time. With this loan she will be able to invest it by purchasing flour, flavoring, shortening, and other ingredients at wholesale prices. This will enable her to complete her orders and create beautiful cakes.

Translated from Spanish by Matthew Raimondi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase ingredients for her cake business

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Doña Victoria tiene 60 años y vive con 2 de sus hijos. Esta mujer es muy diligente en el cuidado de sus vacas que tiene en su establo, desde temprano por la mañana se levanta para cortar el pasto y hacerlo reposar en sombra hasta que quede seca, ya que nos dice que el pasto húmedo puede ocasionar molestias a sus vacas y siempre cumple con el horario exacto en su alimentación, todos estos cuidados hacen que la calidad de leche  que producen sus vacas sea óptima, tanto así que una empresa lechera diariamente compra de la leche que sus vacas producen, para Doña Victoria esto es un gran aliciente que la motiva a seguir esforzándose. Es su cuarto préstamo con MFP, y durante los ciclos anteriores ha demostrado ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el dinero solicitado comprará abono para la siembra de sus pastizales y garantizar el alimento de sus vacas.
texts.en:
Doña Victoria is 60 years old and lives with two of her children. She is very diligent in caring for her cows in her stable. She wakes up early in the morning to cut the fodder and let it rest in the shade until it dries. She explains that moist fodder can cause problems in her cows. The fodder is always ready exactly at feeding time. All of these precautions ensure that her cows produce high quality milk, so much so that it is purchased by a dairy company on a daily basis. For Doña Victoria this is a great incentive that motivates her. This is the fourth loan through MFP. During her previous loan cycles she has been punctual with her payments. With the money from the loan she will purchase fertilizer for the seeding of her pastureland and to guarantee the nutriment of her cows.

Translated from Spanish by Matthew Raimondi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer for the pastureland of her cows

loans.name: Didier Boanerge

texts.es: El señor Didier Boanerge B. tiene la edad de 43 años, habita en el barrio Juan Ramón Padilla en la ciudad de Ticuantepe junto a su esposa, y hijos, la esposa de él trabaja como docente para poder cubrir con los gastos del hogar, lo planes para su familia es mejorar la vivienda para que tenga una mejor privacidad y que sus hijos lleguen hacer unos profesionales .Don Didier al igual que su esposa trabaja como docente desde hace dieciocho años dando enseñanza a muchos jóvenes. El solicita el apoyo de nuestra micro-financiera para comprar materiales de construcción ya que quieren mejorar parte de la casa para tener comodidad con su familia, lo cual será para el de  gran beneficios este préstamo
texts.en:
Señor Didier Boanerge B. is 43 years old and lives in the Juan Ramón Padilla neighborhood in the city of Ticuantepe with his wife and children. His wife works as a teacher in order to be able to cover the household expenses. The plan is for his family to improve their dwelling so that they have more privacy and his hope is that their children will be able to become professionals. Don Didier also works as a teacher and has been doing so for the past eighteen years. During this time he has had the opportunity to teach many young people. He is seeking the help of our micro-finance organization in order to buy construction materials to improve part of his house and the overall comfort for his family. This loan will greatly benefit him and his family.

Translated from Spanish by Matthew Raimondi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase construction materials to improve the condition of his house

loans.name: Lourdes Del Socorro

texts.es: La Sra. Lourdes tiene 42 años de edad, habitante del barrio fantasma en la capital, estado civil casada su esposo es comerciante, tiene tres preciosos hijos de 16, 21 y 23 años de edad. Sus planes para la familia es mejorar su nivel de vida y ofrecerles nuevas oportunidades en esta vida. Doña Lourdes posee su pequeño negocio  una pulpería desde hace 12 años, la inicio con fondo propio de su trabajo anterior. Los planes en el ámbito comercio es aumentar el volumen de las ventas con nuevos productos. Gracias a los prestamos de Afodenic lograra comprar nuevos  y mas productos para obtener mayores utilidades y variedades de productos para ofertar a sus clientes
texts.en:
Mrs. Lourdes is 42 years old and lives in the fantasma neighborhood in the capital. She is married and her husband is a merchant. She has three precious children, ages 10, 21, and 23. Her hope is to improve her family's quality of life and offer them new opportunities. Doña Lourdes has owned a small grocery store for the past 12 years, which she started with money she earned at her previous job. The plan for her business is to increase the volume of sales by bringing in new products. Thanks to the loans from Afodenic, she will be able to buy larger quantities of existing and new products to increase earnings, and also increase the variety of products she is able to offer her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Matthew Raimondi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy various products to supply her grocery store

loans.name: Yeci

texts.es: Yeci tiene 26 años y vive con sus 2 hijos. Tiene una pequeña granja que implementó en su casa, se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, además posee extensiones de pastizales como alimento para sus animales, y de esta manera venderlos periódicamente. Hace un año enfrentó una gran dificultad, cuando una enfermedad mató a gran cantidad de sus cuyes, y aún se está recuperando de esa pérdida, es por ellos que tiene todos los deseos de seguir adelante, porque le es necesario ser sostén de sus hijos. Es la segunda vez que Yeci solicita un préstamo con MFP, y en este tiempo ha demostrado ser muy puntual en sus pagos. Esta cantidad será utilizada en la compra de más cuyes de raza para implementar su granja,  además, fertilizante para sus pastizales y con una parte comprará zapatos para vender durante estas fechas festivas.
texts.en:
Yeci is 26 years old and lives with her two children. She has a small farm that she established at her house. She nurtures young animals and owns pastureland, which she uses to feed her animals. Periodically she sells some of her animals. A year ago she was confronted with very trying times when a disease killed a large amount of her guinea pigs. She is still recovering from this loss. This is the second time that Yeci has requested a loan through MFP. During this time she has been very punctual with her payments. This loan will be used to purchase more guinea pigs to add to her farm. In addition she will purchase fertilizer for her pastureland and shoes to sell during the holidays.

Translated from Spanish by Matthew Raimondi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase more guinea pigs

loans.name: Santos Isabel

texts.es: El señor Santos Isabel García tiene la edad de 51 años, habita en el barrio Panamá ubicado en municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su esposa y hijos , la esposa de don Santos le ayuda con la casa ya que ella no trabaja ,los planes de don Santos es mejorar la producción y darle mejor condición de vida a su familia . La ayuda que el recibe es por parte de un hijo el cual trabaja como albañil. Este cliente desde hace treinta  años trabaja como agricultor y por falta de financiamiento y de recursos no ha podido ampliar su plantación. El necesita el apoyo para comprar fertilizantes para aplicarle a sus cultivos y poder vender una buena producción que le genere buenos ingresos.
texts.en:
Santos Isabel García is 51 years old and lives with his wife and children in the Panamá neighborhood of Ticuantepe. His wife takes care of their home since she is no longer employed. He has a son who is a construction worker and helps support the family.

Santos has worked for thirty years as a farmer, but due to lack of funding and other resources has not been able to increase his farm's production. His dream is to increase his harvest in order to give his family a higher standard of living. He will use this loan to buy fertilizer for his crops so that he can sell more and generate more income.

Translated from Spanish by Kris Vickery, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and pesticides for crops

loans.name: Angélica

texts.es: Angélica tiene 44 años, está casada con Mario de 53 años, tiene dos hijos, Juan de 20 y Dante de 13 años. Se dedica a la atención en su peluquería desde hace un año en que puso su negocio, ya que anteriormente trabajaba en el salón de una amiga, donde aprendió todo lo que necesitaba para poner su propio negocio. Lo que le gusta a Angélica de su trabajo es el rol de consejera que cumple con sus clientas, las cuales mientras se realizan los peinados, cortes, ondulaciones, etc., le cuentan a sus problemas  pidiéndole sus consejos. El negocio va creciendo poco a poco y en base a mucho esfuerzo y dedicación esta arrojando sus primeras ganancias, es por eso que ella necesita de nuestro apoyo para lograr todas sus metas. Angélica se encuentra en su segundo préstamo en Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero solicitado comprará mayor cantidad de instrumentos y productos para mejorar la atención de su peluquería.
texts.en:
Angelica is 44 years old, married to Mario, who is 53 years old. They have two children, Juan, 20 and Dante, 13. One year ago, she started her own hair salon, where she works today. Before that she worked in a friend’s salon where she learned everything she needed to start her own business. What Angelica likes about her job is the counseling role she plays with her clients. While she cuts, styles and perms their hair, they often tell her their problems and ask for advice. Her business is slowly growing and based on a lot of hard work and dedication she is seeing her first earnings. Because of this she needs our help to achieve all of her goals. Angelica is in her second loan cycle with Microfinanzas Prisma. With the loan money she will buy more supplies and products to improve the service at her salon.

Translated from Spanish by Rachel Crouch, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy products for her beauty salon

loans.name: Dionicio

texts.es: Dionicio tiene 55 años, vive con su esposa y sus hijos Godofredo de 30, Yanet de 28, Luis Enrique de 26, Marco Antoni de 24 e Indira de 5 años. La venta de colchas (cubre camas) es el negocio de Dionicio, al cual se dedica desde hace 15 años, ya que le ha arrojado buenos ingresos para poder mantener a su familia. El trae las colchas de la ciudad de Desaguadero, frontera con Bolivia, vendiéndolas a precios cómodos, atrayendo la preferencia del público. Lo más difícil de su trabajo son los constantes viajes que debe realizar a este lugar para poder adquirir su mercadería. Lo bueno es que toda su familia lo apoya haciendo que el negocio progrese y salga adelante. Dionicio se encuentra en su segundo préstamo en Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero solicitado viajará a comprar más colchas, para venderlas en estas fiestas navideñas.
texts.en:
Dionicio is 55 years old and lives with his wife and their children, Godofredo, 30, Yanet, 28, Luis Enrique, 26, Marco Antoni, 24 and Indira, 5. For the past 15 years Dionicio has sold comforters (for beds). This provides a good income that he uses to support his family. He gets the comforters in the city of Desaguadero, on the border with Bolivia, and he sells them at reasonable prices, which helps him earn his customer’s loyalty. The most difficult thing about his job are the constant trips to the border to buy merchandise. The good thing is that his whole family helps him and the business has grown. Dionicio is in his second loan cycle with Microfinanza Prisma. With the loan money he will travel to buy more comforters to sell during the holidays.

Translated from Spanish by Rachel Crouch, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase the merchandise he sells

loans.name: John

texts.es: John tiene 29 años, vive con su esposa Sonia de 26 años y su hija Melinda de 5 años de edad. Es un joven muy carismático que desde hace 6 años se dedica a brindar servicio de taxi, en la ciudad de Puno, para mantener a su familia. John y su esposa Sonia siempre han velado por el bienestar de sus hijos, es por eso que se dedican a trabajar muy duro, Sonia es comerciante y apoya con los gastos del hogar logrando que sea más estable y feliz. Lo difícil del trabajo de John es realizar la manutención del carro que frecuentemente falla a causa de su demasiado uso. Se encuentra en su primer préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero solicitado hará refaccionar su taxi para brindar un mejor servicio.
texts.en:
John is 29 years old and lives with his wife Sonia, 26 and their daughter Melinda, 5. He is a charismatic person who for the last six years has driven a taxi in the city of Puno to support his family. John and his wife Sonia have always protected the well-being of their children and because of this they work very hard. Sonia works in retail and helps with the household expenses. This makes their home more stable and happy. The hard part about John’s job is to keep up with the maintenance of his car. His car often breaks down due to overuse. This is his first loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. With the loan money he will repair his taxi in order to offer better service.

Translated from Spanish by Rachel Crouch, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Taxi repair

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana tiene 42 años, es divorciada y vive con sus dos hijos Sheyla de 21 y Paúl de 18 años. Se dedica a la venta de ropa en uno de los mercados más concurridos de la ciudad de Juliaca, ella sale desde muy temprano y regresa a las 7 u 8 de la noche para lograr mayores ventas. Juana es muy apoyada por sus hijos y es por ellos que quiere salir adelante y solicita nuestra ayuda para hacer realidad todas sus metas, ella sabe que trabajando como lo viene haciendo logrará mejores resultados por el bien de su familia. Juana se encuentra en su segundo préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma. Con el dinero solicitado comprará mayor cantidad de mercadería para aprovechar la demanda de época navideña.
texts.en:
Juana is 42 years old, is divorced and lives with her two children, Sheyla, 21 and Paul, 18. She sells clothes in one of the busiest markets in the city of Juliaca. She leaves her house very early and returns at 7 or 8 p.m. in order to maximize her sales. Juana’s children are very supportive and it is because of them that she wants to get ahead and is asking for our help to achieve her goals. She knows that working hard like she is now will help her achieve good things for her family. This is Juana’s second loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. With the loan money she will buy more clothes to sell in order to take advantage of the increased demand during the holidays.

Translated from Spanish by Rachel Crouch, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase clothes to sell at market

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia tiene 28 años, está separada de su pareja y vive con su pequeño Jhon Anibal de 8 años. Se dedica a la venta de productos domésticos variados, más conocidos como “chiflaría”, desde hace 7 años, para lograr cubrir los gastos de su hogar, ella comienza la venta desde muy temprano en la mañana para terminar a las 6 o 7 de la noche. Las ventas son buenas y Julia espera seguir prosperando por el bienestar de hijo, al cual espera darle una buena educación. Lo más difícil de su trabajo es el tener que permanecer durante casi todo el día, sin poder pasar más tiempo con su pequeño hijo, pero aún así, ve el lado positivo de su trabajo, que es que puede realizarlo con total tranquilidad y es su propia jefa. Julia se encuentra en su segundo préstamo con Microfinanzas Prisma, siendo muy puntual en los pagos. Con el dinero solicitado comprará mayor cantidad de productos para venderlos y también incursionar en la venta de artículos navideños.
texts.en:
Julia is 28 years old, she is separated from her husband and lives with her son Jhon Anibal, 8. For the past 7 years she has worked selling a variety of household products to pay for household expenses. She begins selling very early in the morning and finishes by 6 or 7 p.m. Sales are good and Julia hopes to continue her success for the well-being of her son. She wants to give him a good education. The hardest part of her job is being away from her son the whole day, but she still sees the positive side—that she is her own boss. This is Julia’s second loan with Microfinanzas Prisma and she is very punctual with her payments. With the loan money she will buy more products to sell and also begin to sell Christmas and holiday products.

Translated from Spanish by Rachel Crouch, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase more merchandise to sell

loans.name: Sam

texts.en:
Mrs. Sam N. is a villager in Khvet Village in Kampong Cham Province in Cambodia. She is a farmer who owns 1-hectar of land which she cultivates rice to earn a living. On her plantation, she faces a small problem because her soil is infertile and the rice crop is not plentiful. In order to solve this problem, Mrs. Sam N. decided to ask for a loan to buy fertilizers to improve the soil and improve her crop output. Her husband, Mr. Hean Heng, helps her on the plantation.

Mrs. Sam N. is 26-years-old and the mother of four children. Two are attending the local school while the others are too young to work or study. Her husband is with her in the picture.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers to improve the soil and make her crop more productive.

loans.name: Phal

texts.en:
Mrs. Phal H. was born in 1972 and lives in Khvet Village in the Kampong Cham Province of Cambodia. She owns two hectares of land and cultivates rice to earn a living. Her soil is infertile which reduces the amount of crops she is able to harvest. In order to deal with this problem, Mrs. Phal H. decided to ask for a loan to buy fertilizers to support thesoil and make her land more productive.

Her husband, Mr. Lim Nob, assists her on the plantation. Mrs. Phal H. has three children who are all attending the local school. Her husband is shown on the left in the photo.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers to improve the soil, making her crop more productive.

loans.name: Yett

texts.en:
Mr. Yett Y. is a villager in Krodas Kor village in the Kampong Cham province of Cambodia. He is a pig breeder. Since this business is going well, he wants to expand it so he decided to ask for a loan to buy two more piglets for breeding. In addition, he would use the rest of the loan to buy fertilizers to support his wife’s field and improve the soil.

Mr. Yett Y. is 45-years-old and the father of a child who is attending the local school. His wife is in the picture with him.

loans.use: To buy two more piglets for breeding and fertilizers to improve the soil.

loans.name: Kae

texts.en:
Mr. Kae K. is a villager in Krodas Khor village in the Kampong Cham province of Cambodia. He is a palm juice collector who gathers juice to process into palm sugar and wine. His wife, Mrs. Sum Im, is farmer who cultivates a little rice revenue. Their small income cannot provide for better living conditions for the household.

On the rice plantation, the soil has become infertile which reduces the rice crop. In order to deal with this problem, Mr. Kae K. decided to ask for a loan to buy fertilizers to make his wife's soil more productive.

Mr. Kae K., 32, is the father of four children, two of whom are attending the local school while the remaining two are too young to work or study. His wife is on the left of the photo.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers to make the rice crop more productive.

loans.name: Phen

texts.en:
Mrs. Phen P. was born in 1974 and lives in Krodas Khor village in the Kampong Cham province in Cambodia. She owns a small piece of land and cultivates rice for a living. On her plantation, she now has an obstacle because her soil is infertile which affects her crop. To deal with this problem, she decided to ask for a loan to buy fertilizers to improve the field and make her crop more productive.

Her husband, Mr. Koeurn Kan, is a palm juice collector who gathers the juice to process into palm sugar or wine. Mrs. Phen P. is 34-years-old and the mother of two children, one of whom is enrolled in the local school while the youngest one stays at home. Her husband is shown on the left in the photo.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers to support the field to make her rice crop more productive.

loans.name: Long

texts.en:
Long P., 42 year old mother of four, lives in the province of Pursat. Two of her sons are students; one daughter is a farmer; and another daughter is married and lives away from home. Mrs. P. has been growing rice and vegetable crops for nearly twenty years. 

Her husband, Ram Roeun, is 42 years old. He works with his wife as a rice farmer, and raises ducks, chickens, and pigs at their home. He usually sells his animals four or five months after raising them for poultry purposes. Poultry is the main source of income for the family. Mrs. P. has requested a loan for her husband to buy more piglets, ducks, and chickens to raise. 

Mrs. P.'s husband is pictured because she was not available.

loans.use: To buy piglets, ducks, and chickens to raise

loans.name: Thorn

texts.en:
Mrs. Thorn C. is a villager in Krodas Khor village in the Kampong Cham province in Cambodia. She is a farmer who owns two hectares of land to cultivate rice to earn a living for her family. On this plantation, she now faces a small problem because her field has infertile soil. She decided to ask for a loan to buy fertilizers to improve the field and make her crop more productive, thus increasing her rice revenue.

Her husband, Mr. Koeurn Ky, helps her on the plantation. Mrs.Thorn C. is 38-years-old and the mother of two children who are both attending the local school. Her husband is in the picture with her.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers to improve the field and make her rice crop more productive.

loans.name: Khaem

texts.en:
Mrs. Khaem P. is a villager and lives in Dambong Derk Village in the Kampong Cham Province in Cambodia. She is a farmer who cultivates rice twice a year. Now is the time to cultivate rice in the dry season. Unfortunately, she does not have enough money to cultivate rice so she decided to ask for a loan to hire laborers to work in the rice field.

Her husband, Mr. Ny Try, helps her on the plantation. Mrs. Khaem P. is 61-years-old and the mother of five children, three of whom are employed in a garment factory while another one is a farmer. The remaining child is attending the local school.

loans.use: To hire laborers to work in the rice field.

loans.name: Nhor

texts.en:
Mrs. Nhor T. is a villager in Dambong Derk Village in Kampong Cham Province. She is a farmer who owns a small plot of land on which she cultivates rice. 

Her husband, Mr. Pin Tuong, is a cow breeder. Since his business is going well, he wants to expand it, so Mrs. Nhor T. has decided to ask for a loan to buy one more cow for her husband's business. 

Mrs. Nhor T. is 57 years old and the mother of two children who are employed in a garment factory.

loans.use: To buy another cow for her husband's business.

loans.name: Ra

texts.en:
Mrs. Ra M. is a farmer who lives in Boeng Ka Erk Village in Kandal Province. She is a 40-year-old widow with five children. One of her children is employed in the garment factory, another owns a small soup restaurant, and the remaining three attend the local school. 

Although Mrs. Ra M. and her children have many businesses, they still do not have enough money to build a kitchen to cook. To enable Mrs. Ra M. to cook, she has decided to ask for a loan to buy timbers to build a kitchen.

loans.use: To buy timbers to build a kitchen for cooking.

loans.name: Moeurn

texts.en:
Mrs. Moeurn K. is a villager from Ampil Village in Kandal Province. She is a farmer who owns 1.5-hectares and cultivates rice to earn a living. 

She now faces a lot of problems, because she does not have enough money to buy rice seed, so she has decided to ask for a loan to buy it. She will use the rest of the loan to purchase fertilizers, fuel and pesticide to support the field to make her crops more productive. 

Her husband, Mr. Morn Run, helps her on the farm. Mrs. Moeurn K. is 50 years old and the mother of three children, two of whom are employed as garment factory workers, while the youngest one is attending the local school. Her husband appears with her in the picture.

loans.use: To buy rice seed, fertilizers, fuel, and pesticides

loans.name: Pham Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Phạm Thị Ngân năm nay  41 tuổi. Chị đang sống cùng chồng và 3 con tại xã Hưng Trung huyện Hưng Nguyên tỉnh Nghệ An. Hiện tại chị đang làm nghề may và kinh doanh quần áo. Bên cạnh đó chồng chị làm thầu xây dựng nên thu nhập của gia đình chị rất ổn định. Với mức thu nhập 5.000.000đ/ tháng kinh tế gia đình chị Ngân đang ngày càng ổn định và phát triển
Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 14.000.000đ để đầu tư cho công việc kinh daonh quần áo của gia đình.
texts.en:
Mrs. Pham Thi N. is 41 years old. She is currently living with her husband and three children in Hung Trung commune, Hung Nguyen district, Nghe An province. She is a tailor and she also sells clothes. Her husband is a construction contractor, and therefore her family has a stable source of income. With a monthly income of VND5,000,000, the economic situation of Mrs. N.'s family is increasingly stable and improved. In this loan cycle, she requests a loan of VND14,000,000 to expand her clothes trading business.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Expand clothes trading business

loans.name: Kha

texts.en: Mrs. Kha S. is 28 years old and lives Taing Chrey village in Kampong Cham province. She and her husband, Mr. Len Roeun, are farmers who own a plot of land to cultivate rice. Even though they work hard, they still do not earn enough money to support their family. Thus, Mrs. Kha S. decided to ask for a loan to buy ducklings and duck food to start a breeding business. She hopes to increase her income and improve her living conditions with this loan after she sells the ducks. She has three children who are all staying at home. Her husband is presented with her in the picture.

loans.use: To buy ducklings and duck food to start a breeding business.

loans.name: Thon

texts.en: Mr. Thon P. is a farmer in Taing Chrey village in Kampong Cham province. He owns one hectare of land to cultivate rice. His wife, Mrs. Hang Sareim, breeds pigs. Since her pigs are bigger and bigger, she does not have enough money to support them. In addition, he wants to start breeding fish to increase his income. Thus, Mr. P. decided to ask for a loan to buy pig food and he would use the rest of the loan to add to his savings to start a fish breeding business. He hopes to support and provide a better life for his family living. He is 31 years old and the father of two children who are attending the local school. His wife is presented in the picture instead of her husband, Mr. Thon P..

loans.use: To buy pig food and to start fish breeding business.

loans.name: Hoang Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Hoàng Thị Xuân 32 tuổi, chị thma gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2002. Hiện tại công việc đem lại nguồn thu nhập chủ yếu cho gia đình chị Xuân là từ chăn nuôi và trồng trọt. Ngoài ra chồng chị là thợ cắt tóc nên  hàng tháng gia đình chị đều có thêm khoản thu nhập ổn định. Với mức thu nhập 3.500.000đ/ tháng gia đình chị Xuân đang ngày càng có thêm điều kiện để cải thiện cuộc sống và đầu tư cho các con ăn học
Với mức vốn 17.000.000đ xin vay trong vòng vốn tới chị Xuân dự định sẽ sử dụng để đầu tư sửa sang chuồng trại và thức ăn phục vụ cho chăn nuôi
texts.en:
Mrs. Hoang Thi X. is 32 years old. She has participated in TYM Fund since 2002. Currently the major sources of income of Mrs. X.'s family are from raising livestock and farming. Her husband is a barber, so her family has an extra stable source of money. With a monthly income of VND3,500,000, Mrs. X. family has resources to improve their lives and pay for the children's study. In this loan cycle, Mrs. X. requests a loan of VND17,000,000 to renovate the barns and buy food for livestock.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Renovate the barns and buy food for livestock

loans.name: Sun

texts.en: Sun S., 30, has three children and lives in the Kampong Cham province with her husband, Him Channy (pictured here). They work together selling rice from their home, and they make around $8 US each day. All of their children are students. Sun S. is asking for a loan of $300 US to expand her rice stock. They believe that with the loan, the expansion of their business will bring about an increased income and a higher standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase rice.

loans.name: Hoang Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Hoàng Thị Hường  năm nay 32 tuổi. Gia đình chị có 3 con trong đó 2 con còn nhỏ. Năm 2002 chị Hường tham gia Quỹ tình thương và vay vốn để đầu tư vào chăn nuôi và làm hàng sáo. Bên cạnh nguồn thu nhập từ chăn nuôi, gia đình chị còn có thêm nguồn thu từ lương làm thợ xây dựng của chồng nên kinh tế gia đình rất ổn định với mức thu nhập 4.000.000đ/ tháng
Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 12.000.000đ  để đầu tư mua trâu và thức ăn phục vụ chăn nuôi.
texts.en:
Mrs. Hoang Thi H. is 32 years old. She has three children and two of them are still small.In 2002, Mrs. H. joined the TYM Fund and borrowed money for livestock raising and rice milling. Apart from income from livestock raising, her family also has additional income from the wages of her husband who is a construction worker, therefore the economic situation of her family is very stable with a monthly income of VND4,000,000. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow VND12,000,000 to buy buffaloes and foods for livestock.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raising livestock

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Nguyễn Thị Nhơn 33 tuổi, chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2003. Hiện tại công việc đem lại thu nhập chủ yếu cho gia đình chị Nhơn là từ chăn nuôi và tiền công đi làm thuê của chồng. Với mức thu nhập 3.000.000đ/ tháng cuộc sống gia đình chị Nhơn đang ngày càng được cải thiện hơn.
Vòng vốn tới chị Nhơn mong muốn được vay 15.000.000đ để đầu tư sửa sang chuồng trại và mua thêm gà, vịt về nuôi.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyễn Thị Nhơn is 33 years old. She has been a regular participant in the TYM Fund since 2003. Currently, the income of Mrs. Nhơn’s family comes mainly from raising animals and from wages her husband earns as a hired day-laborer. With their monthly income of 3,000,000 VND (180 USD), Nhơn and her family are slowly but steadily improving their life. In the next lending cycle, she hopes to borrow 15,000,000 VND (900 USD) to invest in repairs to her chicken coop, and to buy more chickens and ducks to raise.

Translated from Vietnamese by Robert Sides, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raising chickens and ducks

loans.name: Ek

texts.en: Mr. Ek S., 54, and his wife, Saov Yoan, 39, are residents of Pursat Province. The couple have four children, all of whom are still young and attending school. They are farmers who own a plot of land in their village to grow different kinds of crops like rice, fruits and vegetables.  They have been in this business since 1979. These crops are the main source of income for their family.To alleviate the hard physical labour and to expand the business, Mr. S. would like to apply for a loan to purchase a farming machine for plowing and transportation purposes.

loans.use: To purchase a farming machine

loans.name: You

texts.en: You H., 48, is a widow living in the Kampong Cham province with her one child and her niece. She is a farmer and makes $3 US a day and is supported by her child and her niece who work in garment factory and as a farmer, respectively. You H. is asking for a loan of $500 US to purchase a water pump to irrigate her rice field.

loans.use: To purchase a water pump.

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Nguyễn Thị L. năm nay 43 tuổi. Chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2002. Trước khi tham gia Quỹ  tình thương  thu nhập của gia đình chị L. chủ yếu dựa vào chăn nuôi và trồng trọt. Sau khi tham gia Quỹ tình thương chị L. đã vay vốn để đầu tư vào kinh doanh buôn bán. Hiện nay chị L. đang là chủ của hàng tạp tại xã Hưng Đạo  huyện Hưng Nguyên tỉnh Nghệ An. Công việc kinh doanh đang phát triển thuận lợi và đem lại cho gia đình chị L. thu nhập 3.000.000đ/ tháng.
 Vòng vốn tới chị L. mong muốn được vay 15.000.000đ để đầu tư vốn cho công việc kinh daonh buôn bán của gia đình.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyễn Thị L. is 43 years old. She has been a regular participant in the TYM Fund since 2002. Before she was able to borrow from the TYM Fund, her family’s income depended on raising animals and farming. Once she became a regular borrower from the Fund, she invested in a retail business. Now Mrs. L. is the owner of a grocery shop in Hưng Đạo commune, Hưng Nguyên district, Nghệ An province. Her business is growing successfully and now earns her family about 3,000,000 VND (180 USD) per month. In the next lending cycle, she hopes to borrow 15,000,000 VND (900 USD) to invest in her shop.

Translated from Vietnamese by Robert Sides, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Grocery shop.

loans.name: Cao Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Cao Thị Thêm năm nay 51 tuổi,  Gia đình chị có 3 con đều đã trưởng thành. Năm 1998 chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương để đầu tư vào chăn nuôi lợn. Đến nay sau 10 năm tham gia Quỹ tình thương  gia đình chị đã có thêm một cửa hàng  kinh doanh hàng ăn. Công việc kinh doanh của gia đình chị đang ngày càng phát triển và cho thu nhập ổn định. Ngoài ra  hàng tháng gia đình chị còn có thêm nguồn thu từ lương của chồng nên  kinh tế rất ổn định với thu nhập 5.000.000đ/ tháng
Vòng vốn tới chị Thêm mong muốn được vay 20.000.000đ để tếp tục đầu tư vào cửa hàng ăn.
texts.en:
Mrs. Cao Thị Thêm is 51 years old and has three grown children. She became a member of the TYM Fund in 1998 in order to invest in raising pigs. In the ten years since then, she and her family used the fund to start a restaurant. This family business continues to develop and provide T. with a steady income. In addition, her husband’s wages contribute to the family earnings, so that they now have a very stable income of about 5,000,000 VND (294 USD) per month. In the next round of lending, Mrs. Thêm hopes to borrow 20,000,000 VND (1175 USD) to invest in further improvements in her restaurant.

Translated from Vietnamese by Robert Sides, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Restaurant

loans.name: Auk

texts.en:
Auk S., 35, pictured with her husband, has two young children and lives in Kampong Cham with her husband. She sells rice and porridge from her home to earn a living and is able to make $4 US a day, while her husband operates a motor-taxi business. On average, he makes $3 US a day. Two of their children are students.

Auk S. is asking for a loan of $1200 US to purchase land to grow yams. This will give her family additional income to help raise its standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase land to grow yams.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more ducks and duck food.

loans.name: Dang Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Đặng Thị Liễu 34 tuổi, chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 1997. Hiêệntịa chị đang là chủ cửa hàng chuyên kinh doanh các lại phân bón  tại huyện Hưng Nguyên tỉnh Nghệ An. Đây cũng là công việc đem lại  nguồn thu nhập  chính cho gia đình chị Liễu trong thời gian qua. Ngoài ra chồng chị làm nghề lái xe nên hàng tháng gia đình chị còn có thêm nguồn thu rất ổn định từ lương của chồng.
Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 10.000.000đ để đầu tư cho công việc kinh doanh phân bón của gia đình .
texts.en:
Mrs. Đặng Thị Liễu, 34 years old, has participated in the TYM Fund since 1997. She is now the owner of a business which specializes in various types of fertilizer, located in Hưng Nguyên district, Nghệ An province. This business is the main source of income for her family. Her husband earns some additional income as a driver, which provides the family with another very steady source of income. In the next lending cycle, she hopes to borrow 10,000,000 VND (600 USD) to invest in her fertilizer business.

Translated from Vietnamese by Robert Sides, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Fertilizer business

loans.name: San

texts.en:
San T., 39, is married and lives with five of her children and her husband in Kampong Cham Province. She works as a farmer together with her husband, and they typically make $5 a day. This couple grows mushrooms, puts them in the packaging, and then sells them to their customers. Two of their children are students and three are employed as garment factory workers.

San T. is asking for a loan of $1000 US to purchase fertilizers and other tools to grow more mushrooms.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers for growing mushrooms.

loans.name: Le Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Lê Thị Phương năm nay 38 tuổi. Chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 1999. Hiện tại cả hai vợ chồng chị đều kinh doanh dịch vụ đám cưới. Do nhu cầu về dịch vụ này tại địa phương đang ngày càng tăng cao nên công việc kinh doanh của gia đình chị cũng phát triển rất thuận lợi và cho thu nhập 3.000.000đ/ tháng
Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 10.000.000đ để mua thêm đồ dùng, trang thiêtd bị phục vụ cho công việc kinh doanh của gia đình.
texts.en:
Mrs. Lê Thị Phương is 38 years old, and has participated in the TYM Fund since 1999. Currently she and her husband together run a business which provides services for weddings. The demand for this type of service has been rising steadily in her community, so her business has become quite successful, and now provides her family with an income of 3,000,000 VND (180 USD) per month. In the next lending cycle, she hopes to borrow 10,000,000 VND (600 USD) to invest in equipment for her wedding services business.

Translated from Vietnamese by Robert Sides, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Wedding services business

loans.name: Chhun

texts.en: Chhun N., 47, is married and lives with four of her children in Kampong Cham Province.
